summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Corporate Card Analytics application. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working perfectly. Successfully tested complete workflow: data seeding (150 customers, 9000+ transactions), K-Means segmentation analysis (4 segments), dashboard visualization, customer management, and beyond-the-card product recommendations.
passed_tests: All 8 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Data seeding functionality - created 150 customers and 9,011 transactions
K-Means segmentation analysis - created 4 customer segments
Dashboard page with statistics and charts
Segmentation page with all 4 segment cards and characteristics
Customers page with search and filter functionality
Customer detail page with recommendations and transaction history
Complete user workflow from data generation to insights

success_percentage.integration: 100% (seamless data flow between backend and frontend)
